steps.name: User should be able to login the page
Click on the media plan name
Click on the Edit Plan link

comments.value: #    Then User should be on start page
#    And Click the Confirm button on an alert popup
#    And Click the Cancel button to dismiss the alert

steps.name: User should be on product page
Select Project by searching with keywords

comments.value: #    Then Some fields should be auto filled

name: Product page
description:
This page contains all the details related to the project
It fetches data from REKB, which contains all the details of Real Estate clients
Need to select the project from the suggestions
